titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Burt's solar compass reference materials [electronic resource]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Burt's solar compass reference materials [electronic resource]

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Lansing, Mich. : Michigan Society of Professional Surveyors Institute, 2010, c2011]

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: From Burt's solar compass : its conception, development, manufacturing, marketing and daily use / by Robert C. Miller.

archdesc.scopecontent: "As noted in Appendix 1 in the book, document reference codes were used by the author to designate various sources of his research material. They are used here to name the ‘file folders’ under which the documents are stored..."--Explanations about CD materials-MSPSI.

corpname.primary_name: Michigan Society of Professional Surveyors Institute
